text:
*[Bug 2606] modifying ftable to allow percentages (wishlist)*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2606>

--- Comment #5 from Elin Waring (<mailto:elin.waring@gmail.com|elin.waring@gmail.com>) ---
I think that this is an older version of bug 18970. I would suggest that this
be closed since this report is from 20003 and a lot has developed since then
and the other issue proposes a more current approach.

text:
*[Bug 14344] Some Windows locales cannot be used*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=14344>

Tomas Kalibera (<mailto:tomas.kalibera@gmail.com|tomas.kalibera@gmail.com>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |tomas.kalibera@gmail.com

--- Comment #6 from Tomas Kalibera (<mailto:tomas.kalibera@gmail.com|tomas.kalibera@gmail.com>) ---
It may be that this is something fixable in R. I vaguely remember some
confusion when setting the locale from R (with the help from ICU, which maybe
we (my code) are not using correctly for this purpose). It might take me long
before I can get to this, but if someone else had the energy to diagnose and
prepare a patch, that would be nice. So in principle, this could be a bug in
Windows, in R or in ICU, I think.
